item.title: Papermerge Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to issues maintaining parity with the upstream container releases, we are deprecating our Papermerge container. We recommend switching to their official container. Their documentation can be found here.
item.content:
Due to issues maintaining parity with the upstream container releases, we are deprecating our Papermerge container.

We recommend switching to their official container.

Their documentation can be found here.

item.title: New Container: Papermerge
item.description: We have released a new container for Papermerge! Papermerge is an open source document management system (DMS) primarily designed for archiving and retrieving your digital documents. Instead of having piles of paper documents all over your desk, office or drawers - you can quickly scan them and configure your scanner to directly upload to Papermerge DMS."
item.content:
We have released a new container for Papermerge!

Papermerge is an open source document management system (DMS) primarily designed for archiving and retrieving your digital documents. Instead of having piles of paper documents all over your desk, office or drawers - you can quickly scan them and configure your scanner to directly upload to Papermerge DMS."
